aesdpy.bookmarks¶

aesdpy.bookmarks.add(api_url, model_id, body={})¶

Insert a bookmark.

Parameters:
  • api_url (string) – A url to query
  • model_id (string) – A model ID
  • body (json) – A bookmark to save
Returns:

A bookmark
Return type:

json

Examples

aesdpy.bookmarks.add success¶
import aesdpy
bookmark = {
    'meta': {
        'name': 'ex1',
        'count': 1,
        'color': '#ffffff',
        'tags': {
            'DC.Creator': 'aesdpy'
        }
    },
    'record_ids': ['Il81Na1b665QiXyF']
}
aesdpy.bookmarks.add('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8090', 'XXp', bookmark)

# Returns:
# {
#     "record_ids": [
#         "Il81Na1b665QiXyF"
#     ],
#     "meta": {
#         "color": "#ffffff",
#         "count": 1,
#         "name": "ex1",
#         "bookmark_id": "rM9m",
#         "tags": {
#             "DC.Creator": "aesdpy"
#         }
#     }
# }
aesdpy.bookmarks.add failure 1¶
import aesdpy
bookmark = {
    'meta': {
        'count': 1,
        'color': '#ffffff',
        'tags': {
            'DC.Creator': 'aesdpy'
        }
    },
    'record_ids': ['Il81Na1b665QiXyF']
}
aesdpy.bookmarks.add('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8090', 'XXp', bookmark)

# Returns:
#
# {
#     'error': {
#         'status': 400,
#         'message': 'Bad Request',
#         'description': 'illegal JSON: Error in $: key 'name' not present'
#     }
# }
aesdpy.bookmarks.add failure 2¶
import aesdpy
bookmark = {
    'meta': {
        'name': 'ex1',
        'count': 1,
        'color': '#ffffff',
        'tags': {
            'DC.Creator': 'aesdpy'
        }
    },
    'record_ids': []
}
aesdpy.bookmarks.add('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8090', 'f0', bookmark)

# Returns:
#
# {
#     'error': {
#         'status': 400,
#         'message': 'Bad Request',
#         'description': 'no record identifiers in bookmark'
#     }
# }
aesdpy.bookmarks.add failure 3¶
import aesdpy
bookmark = {
    'meta': {
        'name': 'ex1',
        'count': 1,
        'color': '#ffffff',
        'tags': {
            'DC.Creator': 'aesdpy'
        }
    },
    'record_ids': ['Il81Na1b665QiXyF']
}
# Note: model 'f0' has no record with id 'Il81Na1b665QiXyF'
aesdpy.bookmarks.add('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8090', 'f0', bookmark)

# Returns:
#
# {
#     'error': {
#         'status': 400,
#         'message': 'Bad Request',
#         'description': 'invalid record identifiers'
#     }
# }
aesdpy.bookmarks.add failure 4¶
import aesdpy
bookmark = {
    'meta': {
        'bookmark_id': 'rM9m',
        'count': 1,
        'color': '#ffffff',
        'tags': {
            'DC.Creator': 'aesdpy'
        }
    },
    'record_ids': ['Il81Na1b665QiXyF']
}
aesdpy.bookmarks.add('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8090', 'f0', bookmark)

# Returns:
# {
#     'error': {
#         'status': 400,
#         'message': 'Bad Request',
#         'description': 'duplicate bookmark identifier'
#     }
# }

API Info:

POST /models/{model_id}/bookmarks¶
Request JSON Object:
 
  • expr (dict) –
  • expr['not'] (dict) –
  • expr['union'] (array(dict)) –
  • expr['isect'] (array(dict)) –
  • expr['var'] (string) – a variable id
  • expr['value'] (string|double) – a variable value
  • expr['set'] (string|double) – a variable value
  • expr['interval'] (array(string|double)) – a variable value
  • meta (dict) –
  • meta['bookmark_id'] (dict) – a unique bookmark ID
  • meta['name'] (string) – a bookmark name
  • meta['count'] (string) – number of participating records
  • meta['color'] (string) – hex color, e.g. ‘#ffffff’
  • meta['tags'] (dict) – a set of tags
  • meta['tags'][tag_id] (string(any)) – a tag description
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – json
  • 400 Bad Request – error description
  • 500 Internal Server Error – error description
aesdpy.bookmarks.get(api_url, model_id, bookmark_id)¶

Get a specific bookmark.

Parameters:
  • api_url (string) – A url to query
  • model_id (string) – A model ID
  • bookmark_id (string) – A bookmark ID
Returns:

A bookmark
Return type:

json

Example

aesdpy.bookmarks.get success¶
import aesdpy
aesdpy.bookmarks.get('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8090', 'f0', '68xQVjByK')

# Returns:
# {
#     "record_ids": [
#         "Yv9CAD",
#         "NIKm9EnR3hjvfV"
#     ],
#     "meta": {
#         "color": "#0b1bfb",
#         "count": 2,
#         "name": "edRU6O3q1UmeLzwFu2wa",
#         "bookmark_id": "68xQVjByK",
#         "tags": {
#             "2z6L9C": "nJ",
#             "n": -1
#         }
#     }
# }
aesdpy.bookmarks.get failure 1¶
import aesdpy
aesdpy.bookmarks.get('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8090', 'f0', 'abcd')

# Response:
# {
#     'error': {
#         'status': 400,
#         'message': 'Bad Request',
#         'description': 'bookmark not found'
#     }
# }

API Info:

GET /models/{model_id}/bookmarks/{bookmark_id}¶
Response JSON Object:
 
  • expr (dict) –
  • expr['not'] (dict) –
  • expr['union'] (array(dict)) –
  • expr['isect'] (array(dict)) –
  • expr['var'] (string) – a variable id
  • expr['value'] (string|double) – a variable value
  • expr['set'] (string|double) – a variable value
  • expr['interval'] (array(string|double)) – a variable value
  • meta (dict) –
  • meta['bookmark_id'] (dict) – a unique bookmark ID
  • meta['name'] (string) – a bookmark name
  • meta['count'] (string) – number of participating records
  • meta['color'] (string) – hex color, e.g. ‘#ffffff’
  • meta['tags'] (dict) – a set of tags
  • meta['tags'][tag_id] (string(any)) – a tag description
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – json
  • 400 Bad Request – error description
  • 500 Internal Server Error – error description
aesdpy.bookmarks.list(api_url, model_id, query={})¶

Get all bookmarks. Provide tag information in query to search for specific items.

Parameters:
  • api_url (string) – A url to query
  • model_id (string) – A model ID
  • query (json) – The query params
Returns:

A set of bookmarks
Return type:

json

Examples

aesdpy.bookmarks.list success 1¶
import aesdpy
aesdpy.bookmarks.list('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8090', 'XXp')

# Returns:
# [
#     {
#         "meta": {
#             "color": "#408422",
#             "count": 1,
#             "name": "6ZSG4iEuzxxO2V6G1xZJ",
#             "bookmark_id": "jftCe0Enb",
#             "tags": {
#                 "w": "GQ",
#                 "5vFit": "i8",
#                 "o": -1.1554219144162807,
#                 "c": 3.980237195769979
#             }
#         }
#     },
#     ...
# ]
aesdpy.bookmarks.list success 2¶
import aesdpy
aesdpy.bookmarks.list('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8090', 'f0', {'lPqy': '5.0250953446542095'})

# Returns:
# [
#     {
#         "meta": {
#             "count": 3,
#             "name": "t0WcvWrXbLA",
#             "bookmark_id": "GQnQa8KWanDNjdGUvSXwZ9",
#             "tags": {
#                 "lPqy": 5.0250953446542095
#             }
#         }
#     }
# ]
aesdpy.bookmarks.list failure¶
import aesdpy
aesdpy.bookmarks.list('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8090', 'f0', {'lPqy': ''})

# Returns:
# {
#     'error': {
#         'status': 400,
#         'message': 'Bad Request',
#         'description': 'Error in $: not enough input'
#     }
# }

API Info:

GET /models/{model_id}/bookmarks¶
Parameters:
  • tag_id (string) – a tag ID
Response JSON Object:
 
  • expr (dict) –
  • expr['not'] (dict) –
  • expr['union'] (array(dict)) –
  • expr['isect'] (array(dict)) –
  • expr['var'] (string) – a variable id
  • expr['value'] (string|double) – a variable value
  • expr['set'] (string|double) – a variable value
  • expr['interval'] (array(string|double)) – a variable value
  • meta (dict) –
  • meta['bookmark_id'] (dict) – a unique bookmark ID
  • meta['name'] (string) – a bookmark name
  • meta['count'] (string) – number of participating records
  • meta['color'] (string) – hex color, e.g. ‘#ffffff’
  • meta['tags'] (dict) – a set of tags
  • meta['tags'][tag_id] (string(any)) – a tag description
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – json
  • 400 Bad Request – error description
  • 500 Internal Server Error – error description
aesdpy.bookmarks.remove(api_url, model_id, bookmark_id)¶

Delete a bookmark.

Parameters:
  • api_url (string) – A url to query
  • model_id (string) – A model ID
  • bookmark_id (string) – A bookmark ID
Returns:

result
Return type:

json

Examples

aesdpy.bookmarks.remove success¶
import aesdpy
aesdpy.bookmarks.remove('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8090', 'f0', 'eUIbEM8')

# Returns:
# {
#     'result': 'ok'
# }
aesdpy.bookmarks.remove failure¶
import aesdpy
aesdpy.bookmarks.remove('http://1lv11lamb01.nrel.gov:8090', 'f0', 'eUIbEM8')

# Returns:
#
# {
#     'error': {
#         'status': 400,
#         'message': 'Bad Request',
#         'description': 'not supported'
#     }
# }

API Info:

DELETE /models/{model_id}/bookmarks/{bookmark_id}¶
Response JSON Object:
 
  • result (string) – the result of delete
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – json
  • 400 Bad Request – error description
  • 500 Internal Server Error – error description
